markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Velociraptor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2915)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A smaller cousin of the deinonychus, the velociraptor is a swift, cunning pack hunter. It has no fear of larger creatures, and a group of these dinosaurs won't hesitate to attack prey the size of a horse. They have manes of feathery plumage that extend down their backs and along the sides of their arms, legs, and tail, while their underbellies and flanks are scaly. These feathers allow them to blend into their natural terrain with ease, but when startled, a velociraptor can puff and frill this plumage to expose brighter colors normally covered by the longer feathers. A typical velociraptor is 1-1/2 feet tall, 7 feet long, and weighs 35 pounds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Velociraptor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2915)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=576" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 96 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 slashing

**Leaping Charge** <actions string="Single Action" />  The velociraptor Strides up to 10 feet, ignoring [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) as it leaps over obstacles. It then makes a Strike with its talons, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

**Pack Attack**   The velociraptor deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the velociraptor's allies.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-391" />
name: Velociraptor
